website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer a belt with a prong-buckle closure, it is easier and faster to adjust than the 2-prong Ader.
pros: A solid, no-taper design with thick leather that provides consistent support
Single-prong buckle is easy to adjust
cons: The leather is somewhat stiff but tends to become more flexible with use

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Will update as needed.
customer_reviews.text: Daily power lifter here so its safe to say this belt will get fairly heavy use at least 5 days a week. Out of the box the belt felt good. Nice and stiff. Used it for squats and deadlifts for 2 weeks and it has held up just fine. All that matters now is how long it will last. I'm 6'1" 200lbs and got size medium. Currently using the 3rd belt hole. Need to drop a couple pounds to I can reach the 4th belt hole and make it tighter. So far, for the price, this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple No Frills Lifetime Belt
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on belts before I made this purchase. If you're serious about power-lifting, this is your belt. What a great belt. This belt is manlier than I am. Very stiff at first. Supposed to be that way with leather like this. Pinches my flab a bit when I'm squatting or doing deadlifts. That's my problem I suppose. Fine after a few adjustments. Have to adjust it pretty tight for it to be effective, so you need a little muscle just to get it on and off. Belt feels like a lifetime purchase. Bought the knee sleeves too, love those as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Kliewer

customer_reviews.title: Great, solidly built belt.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt. It is very well made, heavy, and should serve the serious lifter well. In addition, before the belt arrived I received an email from one of the company's owners assuring me if there were any problems with the order, they would fix it. I'm always happy when a seller takes the time to reach out and make sure the buyer is satisfied. I expect to get years of use from this belt and when I need another product, I will look for this seller.
customer_reviews.author: AM_GNY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome belt highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was persoqnlly able to break it in quickly same day (enough to be able to tightly wear it) by just folding the belt in certain parts of it a few times. Awesome belt ; 13 mm thicker than 10. Single prong much better than double prong cause onyl ahve to tighten one. Greta price I think the other belts that are overpriced you're buying the name but they are the same grade as this. Sturdy tough built to last and the black color looks awesome too. Might persoanalize witha. White sharpie . Highly recommended this belt liking it so far will see how well it goes for me months and years down the road
customer_reviews.author: Ttech

customer_reviews.title: Amazing once broken in
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to break in, I’m still not even all the way there. But I can already tell it’s going to be an amazing belt. So much more sturdy than the cheap Velcro. if you’re serious about squats and deadlifts and keeping your back healthy make the investment. Never go cheap on spine support, you don’t get a second one. My only grief is it can dig into you a little bit, but when I rotate it the pressure goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! I’m new to leg day but great for deadlifts although I’m still getting used to it. I wear a size 31 and fit a size M belt if that helps. 5’6, 154 lbs, lean. I previously bought a size small but was too small so if you’re borderline small/medium when you measure your waste, go with the medium
customer_reviews.author: aaron garcia

customer_reviews.title: This belt freakin’ ROCKS.
customer_reviews.text: This belt rocks. I’ve had it for a year now. I’ve worn it almost every training session since then, week in week out 4-5 days a week for 1 year. I have had absolutely no issues. A little of the stitching coming out, but minor and no issues have come from that. If you’re new to powerlifting, I recommend this highly. It’s much cheaper than a Pioneer or SBD, and it does the job. I am not saying anything bad about the other belts, I’ll probably pick up a Pioneer eventually, but this Stoic belt is awesome for the price. I would recommend 10 times over.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Devantier

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to break in.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what this is made of but its incredibly stiff. My son got it on but couldn't get it off without the help of 2 other guys. We did all the break in methods but nothing worked. Gave up, now it just sits. You get what you pay for in life. Ended up spending more on another power belt and they broke in and fit and worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: MSC

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Leather
customer_reviews.text: While I had bought this belt over a year ago, I seldom wear a belt except on heavy working and top sets. On one of those sets last week, the leather tore at the rung I wear the belt at. The belt is now effectively worthless as it does not fit comfortably the rung above or below. It saddens me as I have bought Stoic wrist straps and knee sleeves. I have worn several belts in my lifetime, and have only replaced them as I out grew them. I do hope Stoic stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Last belt you will buy for a long time!!!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is awesome and will last awhile. The single prong instead of double makes it easier to take on and off. I have already set new pr’s with this belt because of the excellent support it gives. No it's not a high dollar inzer belt, but this belt is just as good for half the price. Also customer service is awesome as well, so if you need to exchange the belt because it doesn't fit or whatever they will help you no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Study as hell
customer_reviews.text: Tough, high quality belt. Very sturdy and gives a lot of support. One thing to note: the belt is very thick, so getting into a deep deadlifting position or deep squat position can be difficult and uncomfortable. However, if you're looking for a heavy duty belt for 400lb+ lifts, you're probably willing to put up with a little bit of discomfort for extra support.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bush

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece of equipment at half the price of others ...
customer_reviews.text: This belt was much thicker and stronger than I expected! Amazing piece of equipment at half the price of others I was looking at. Just using a belt I increased my squat that o wqs comfortable doing from 365 for a single to 435 for a double. Evolutionize was great for support as well - I thought I was going to need the next size up when I was just trying it on since I was on the last hole of a L, and they were completely willing to replace it, but I actually worked with it and the second hole worked better so to decided to stick with the L. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ChristopherLOwens

customer_reviews.title: I've been heavy lifting for a year and someone recently ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been heavy lifting for a year and someone recently suggested I get a belt. They sent me the name of this belt and so I tried it out. I immediately broke my plateau and was able to increase weight in squat and deadlift. It is VERY inflexible which can be uncomfortable after some time.
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: It’s very sturdy and thick
customer_reviews.text: I was beginning to experience lower back soreness after deadlifts before I bought this belt. 3 weeks after using it, no longer the case. It’s very sturdy and thick. It’s a little hard to adjust at first because the leather needs to be broken in, but other than that no issues. Also, I deadlift conventional and I didn’t have any issues with the belt getting in the way of my setup, like other reviews indicated. For reference, I’m a 5’9” female
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this belt
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this belt. It was a great price and was great quality. Would definitely buy again. Make sure to measure the belt when it comes- the amazon warehouse sent the incorrect size and they were missing the inserts with the size. The seller corrected amazons error for us very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F

customer_reviews.title: Very good belt
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice, thick, wide belt with no taper, and this fits the bill. I've been using it for a few months now and it is very good quality. The big buckle can sometimes dig into my gut a little, but other than that its very comfortable. I bought this belt based on a recommendation from a friend at the gym and don't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Bedwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made belt it came today and I went right to the gym and did Deadlifts. I felt extremely secure and it actually put me in a better lifting position. It's extremely sturdy and will take some time to break in but that is how a good belt is supposed to come out the box. If you are into powerlifting or the real core fundamental lifts like Squat, Deadlift, Arnold Press and Bench Press. Then this is the belt for you
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The best powerlifting belt out there for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I looked high and low for a belt that met the guidelines my trainer told me to go by. I had given up on finding one reasonably priced until I came upon the stoic powerlifting belt. The belt is exactly as it is advertised. The belt is flexible, sturdy, and provides the perfect amount of stability when worn properly. I highly recommend this belt if you want to get into deadlifting.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure at first how I would like it
customer_reviews.text: Time has proven this to be a great belt. I've had mine for a year now and it has held up well. I haven't had any issues with the stitching come loose or the glue between the black suede come off either. I use mine 4 days a week at the gym and I think this belt will last me 20 years if I take care of it. I do put saddle soap on mine every 3 months or so as this really helps the leather avoid absorbing any sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality product with customer service to match
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this weightlifting belt. Can't beat such an amazing powerlifting belt at such a great price. This is high quality item which is made to last. This company also have OUTSTANDING customer service...which is very rare in our society these days. They are wonderful to deal with as well as having a top quality product. Thanks so much...I'm taking this all the way back to Australia with me and will be the envy of many.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great stability and and overall fantastic belt. Lasted two years
customer_reviews.text: This belt has been great to me. I have owned it just over two years now, using it three times a week and it's been amazingly supportive. Unfortunately, the belt loop that I always use just split and I am going to have to replace it soon. I'll probably just buy this again because it's a great price for how good this belt is.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: the loop would be better position about 2-3" away from the buckle
customer_reviews.text: Belt's construction is noticeably well made. It is very stiff and will require breaking in. I can not thread the excess through the loop; the loop would be better position about 2-3" away from the buckle. I find that this belt is too wide for my deadlifts, so if you aren't a bigger guy, you may consider getting a 3" wide belt for getting into the correct start position for your deadlifts/cleans/barbell rows. All in all, a good belt. 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Alan Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small!
customer_reviews.text: With a lifting belt, the middle hole of all the holes on the belt should fall where your navel would be. I could get this to the second hole from the end with effort. The center hole would have me suffocated. So, order a larger size than you need. At least for now (May 2016). I think that this belt was probably made for smaller regional dimensions and need to be adjusted for larger U.S. physiques. Other than that, it's great quality for the price. The belt is made in Pakistan.
customer_reviews.author: wordsoundpower

customer_reviews.title: Fitment and quality surpassed expectations
customer_reviews.text: Initial product received with mold stains on the interior lining. Reported issue to company and rapidly received a response from the co-owner expressing regret and promising a prompt replacement. As promised, received a replacement belt with no visible quality or material issues. Very impressed with responsiveness and overall quality of customer demonstrated by Lift Unlimited.
customer_reviews.author: TyG.

customer_reviews.title: STRONG BELT
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic belt for increasing stability and abdominal activation during heavy squats and deadlifts. It's heavy, high-quality leather, which is impressive for the price. I've seen belts with the same construction and quality for easily twice the price. Also, Lift Unlimited has awesome customer service, who followed up on my purchase to make sure I was enjoying the product, and provided tips for belt use and break-in. Awesome product and company. For size, I am 6'5" and 215 lbs with a 37 inch waist, and the large fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hammer

customer_reviews.title: This has to be the best value belt out there
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best value belt out there, good price and great construction. Customer service is also great. I am going to start looking for this company first when looking for quality fitness equipment at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Best one I used
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you open it , you realise what this is. Very sturdy construction, real hard and you know you got what you paid for. This is real powerlifting belt. Gonna take a long time to break in , but thats what is expected from a 10 mm belt. Not giving it 5 stars as its not for daily workout. Dont need this one for weightlifting unless you are into powerlifting. For daily workout s I use 5 mm and thats much better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The belt loop leather tore into 2 pieces within a few months of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Knusel

customer_reviews.title: I love my Stoic belt
customer_reviews.text: I love my Stoic belt. I have never owned a powerlifting belt before and did my research before I ordered this one. Through a sizing error on my part the belt I ordered was too small. Sharon from Lift Unlimited was phenomenal in how fast she responded. She offered a full exchange to the next size up and had a shipping label to me so I was able to send back the smaller belt the next morning. The replacement belt arrived 2 days later and fits like a dream. I like the unique design and super solid construction. I've been lifting about 2 years and feel like this belt will last me for the rest of my lifting career. Chris
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 13mm belt, excellent quality from a great company!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece! A bit rigid for my taste, but I imagine it's exactly what one would want if ordering a 13mm belt. I wound up sending it back because of sizing (my midsection measures 37.5", so I needed a Large rather than a Medium), and I upgraded to the Pro 10mm from the same company. So very glad I did, too. If you want a rigid belt, this one is a fantastic deal! The customer service/speedy shipping is A+, too!
customer_reviews.author: Chadisbarefoot

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed and also looks pretty sharp, too
customer_reviews.text: Overall great belt, and I feel like all belts should be either single prong (like this one) or lever buckle. This thing provides serious support and it doesn't dig into your ribcage when you brace (my tapered leather doubleprong Valeo did this). Well worth the money, obviously very well made. For those of you hesitant on the sizing, I wear a 32 pants but where I put on a weight belt is more diaphragm area, and that's 34 inches. Large was perfect. Highly recommend for powerlifters and weightlifters.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Quality belt at a unmatched price
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid powerlifter and all I can say is that this belt is very high quality and I highly recommend to all. Very sturdy, comfortable and reliable as all hell. I use it on my heavy days and always can count on it to never fail me. Yes you'll need to break it in however by the 4th time you use it in a training session it'll be set. Again, to all considering this belt: BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Pixels Arts

customer_reviews.title: POWERLIFTING BELT!!! Support when and where you need it most!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a powerlifting belt! It is thick and provides tons of support on those compound lifts! They do run a bit small but you can always drill a couple more holes beyond the stock ones if needed with no adverse effects. It took 8 days of squatting and deadlifts to break it in and allow the leather to start to soften a little bit. I'm over 30 days into using this belt and it is perfect! I squat every day just for reference! One other tip is to take a sander (80 grit) and knock down the inside edge a little so it's not as sharp of a 90 degree angle.
customer_reviews.author: David Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great service, better belt.
customer_reviews.text: Super solid belt. Sizing is a little wonky... Off the sizing chart measurements I fit the L but upon arrival, the L wouldn’t meet in the middle. Went up to an XL and it’s perfect. Overall: really strong, really comfy, real value. Recommendation: measure 2-3 separate times, take the average, and maybe give 1-2” of “wiggle room” on top of the measured number. If you’re on the edge of the next size up, go up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The last powerlifting belt you'll ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: Totally Beefcake belt. Built to last. Built to support. Single prong construction is far easier to get on and off before and after a heavy single or double. No fiddling with the 2nd prong. The leather is stiff yet supple and not rigid. Easy to break in. Truly a value for the price. I would buy another one but I'll never need to replace this one. Recommend for Powerlifting and Strong Man.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Really solid belt for the heavy lifter
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fairly big guy, and on my leg and back days I almost always work over 400 lbs for my squats and deadlifts. I have not been able to put this belt to a maximal weight test, but doing 8 reps at 405 lbs on deadlift this belt offered great support and did not inhibit my ability to get into a good conventional stance. I'm about 5'11" and 260, and an XL fit me perfectly with a little room to grow. I think it will serve me well on many heavy sets to come!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best belts I've seen. Exceptional quality and provides excellent support. I like a little lighter belts but all my friends are crazy about this one, some already ordered the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex@FIGHTECH

customer_reviews.title: Great belt; Power Lifting essential
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit stiff at first but breaks in after a few uses. This is clearly a durable, high quality belt. I only use a belt on the last/heaviest set of a lift and it has proven quite nice to have something to push my abs against for those. I immediately noticed an improvement in my squats with depth and stability on my heavy sets. I don't find deadlifting with a belt to be very comfortable but it does seem to help me maintain form on 1RM attempts. The fit turned out perfect for me; large size belt with a 34" waist.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Best BELT
customer_reviews.text: Best belt I have bought. 1000% confidence when deadlifting. Very secure, make sure you get the sizing right. I am a 30 waist and I got the small
customer_reviews.author: Rhaul R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: I recently got into powerlifting and figured that I needed to invest in a belt that actually supported me rather than a flimsy Harbinger belt. This belt is perfect for someone just getting into powerlifting as you get quality that is comparable to an Inzer or Pioneer belt at half the price point. Now it will obviously never replace those two brands among others but it is a great option when you take into account the quality you get for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy overall with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Belt is very high quality. Works exactly how it should, helps you use your abs to support your back when lifting heavy. I'm very happy overall with the purchase, but I would like to mention one thing. Measure your size the way they tell you on the page, then go one size more than it recommends. I measured myself at a 35" and while a large fits, I only have 2 notches to grow into, upward in size, but a ton I could go down.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Shauan

customer_reviews.title: This is my first belt and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much experience lifting but I have progressed to a point where I need some extra support. This brand was recommended to me by a friend and I'm so glad I listened. This belt is stiff so you need to wear it a few times before it starts to break in. I've worked out four times since it arrived in the mail and it is really starting to loosen up. Very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Love this belt!
customer_reviews.text: Handles like a much more expensive belt. Been using for about a week and it's now one of my favorites! Very good craftsmanship and love the leather feel. Core/back support is great, fit is excellent and should get better with time, easy on and off. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: Must improve quality of product to compete with Inzer, Titan, for competition lifting belts
customer_reviews.text: I'm a coach for a high school powerlifting team and decided to take a chance on these belts. I bought 3 different sizes because they were less expensive than Inzer, I will never make that mistake again! This should have been comparable to the "forever belt", a competition lifting belt best used for Squat and Deadlift. Instead, I have one of the three that broke a rivet after 1 month of use and one competition.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Tough material and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff and sized as expected. I wear 30 -32 waist depending on the pants and have about the same measurement around my stomach and went with the medium. I am right in the middle of the hole range
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great solid belt, very durable and great for Squats and Deads
customer_reviews.text: I like this belt very much but I would suggest check the sizing. I am a size 31-32 pant size. I got the medium and it did not fit me. I ended up getting the large which fit me in the last hole! In any case, more motivation for me to lose some girth before the winter ha ha. For the price point you cannot get a better quality officially recognized belt. The customer service is great, they asked questions to make sure they adjust the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haniffa

customer_reviews.title: Best value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you want to do heavy lifting just go ahead and invest in this belt. Same quality as the more expensive belts! Perfectly made no grays or stitching issues! I would agree the belt is a little small. I have a 40 inch waist with clothes and bracing. The belt fits me about 4 of 8 holes. Glad I got the larger belt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost there
customer_reviews.text: As part of my routine, I incorporate compound exercises such as squats and dead lifts. I have used support belts before and this one does a fine job as it should. It is made if a high quality material. THICK which is good and bad. No bending here. However, the rigidity certainly adds a level of difficulty getting it on. Also, the belt (clasp area) has pinched my skin on my lower abs if the clasp on center to my body. I have to make it off center to avoid it. Sizing runs small fyi.
customer_reviews.author: RickMc

customer_reviews.title: Great belt - excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The belt itself is a hit with my weightlifting daughter. Some of her friends have belt envy now! The fit was great and it is working out well. The customer service was nothing short of spectacular. The owner returns email questions very quickly and they are very accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Western-NY

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality, sizing chart inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing chart is inaccurate. I measured and found me to be a 35” waist at the belly button. Ordered the medium for 33-36” belly. With an adidas climacool shirt I could barely buckle on the first hole so I sent it back. The quality was awesome. When I’m ready I’ll order another.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: ***** Great belt, very thick and I love that it is the same size all around. I used it for the first time today and could definitely feel a difference between using it and not. Great quality product for a great price! *****
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: The belt provides good support and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Used this belt for a few heavy training sessions. The belt provides good support and sturdy construction. Should last a lifetime. Very, very stiff; will need to be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: bigmomo

customer_reviews.title: Should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality thick belt. The leather is stiff and offers solid support during lifts. It’s a bit pricey to other comparable belts but the quality is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: The Green Recluse

customer_reviews.title: Belt quality is good otherwise. He just chalked it up as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a large that was supposed to fit a 36-40" waist. Doesn't even reach around my husbands 36" waist, it's way too small. Belt quality is good otherwise. He just chalked it up as a loss and it's my belt now, though kind of thick for my liking. Edit: while the belt didn't fit, this company is going above and beyond to provide the best customer service I've come across in a really long time. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Matero

customer_reviews.title: Great belt, great price, amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great belt! Just got it a few days ago so still breaking it in! It’s so stiff it didn’t fit right when I bought it-i couldn’t reach the first hole but after rolling it up a few times and having a friend help me buckle it it fits great- I’m actually on the 2-3 holes so it just took some time to get more felixible. Super stiff and supportive for squats and dead’s abs love the black material. Also loved that customer support reached out to give some tips and offer help. Will definitely buy more from this company!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt does its job well. It is very comfortable, and allows the muscles of the core (mainly abs and obliques) to work harder and protect the spine. For a belt of its thickness, it is not terribly difficult to break in, and the single prong makes things considerably easier. It is perfect for squats, presses, and bench presses. The belt is too wide for most people, especially women, to use effectively in a deadlift, but can still serve the purpose if a 2 or 3" belt is unavailable; just loosen it and move it up on the torso a bit. Overall, an excellent addition to any lifter's arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Waters

customer_reviews.title: this belt was useless to me
customer_reviews.text: this belt was useless to me. i hurt my back using it to deadlift. it is too thick to fit snug enough to support your back. i would recommend a thin leather belt.
customer_reviews.author: C Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Durable belt and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Due to the stiffness of the belt, it’s a bit uncomfortable at first. It gets the job done. Customer service is spectacular! I willl buy this brand again due to the helpfulness of the customer service staff.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Update review
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I originally purchased this belt and hated it. The packaging was horrible and the belt looked like it was already worn with water damage. I contacted the seller and they were very helpful. Sent me a new belt and it came in perfect. My only problem is the smell after use, but it’s fine after being dry. Great product. Highly recommend as a first belt
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lexima

customer_reviews.title: Good power lifting belt
customer_reviews.text: Got a XXL, probaly could have used an XL as I have three holes left to spare. Very thick. Will definitely last awhile unless I drop 6 inches in the waste. Stiff and needs to be broken in. To heavy to wear constantly in the gym. Great for powerlifting.
customer_reviews.author: Three of a kind

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!
customer_reviews.text: Super solid belt. It was one notch too small, which I expected. I have a 29" waist and ordered a small to grow into. I drilled another hole and now its perfect. I use it twice a week for Squats, Deadlifts, and Overhead Presses and its made a big difference! If I ever need to replace it, I would get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Go with the recommended length. The belt itself is excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL which is actually too long. My measurement around belly button is around 38",which according to the recommendation is a large. The belt however fits me, when I insert the prong into either one of the first two holes.I would suggest the recommendations are about accurate. Go with the recommended length. The belt itself is excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dwaine L.

customer_reviews.title: Best belt ever.....
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best belt I have ever used and take it from someone who has been lifting for over 10 years. Strong, not cheap! I got it and I'm completely amazed. Also they have some of the best customer support I've ever seen. I don't ever leave a review but I believe they deserve it
customer_reviews.author: DAVID E. PIKE

customer_reviews.title: It provides massive support and is pretty comfortable. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have had the belt for about 1 week and i'm loving it! It is very thick, tough, and feels quite durable. The metal buckle and metal rivets are way more burly than i would have thought. It provides massive support and is pretty comfortable. Definitely recommend. HOWEVER, please listen to the other reviewers that you MUST get the belt one size larger than indicated by the sizing diagram. The belt runs small and you will regret not doing so
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Best belt I've worn worked out in over the past 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome belt!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt and amazing customer service. These belts are sturdy and comfortable at less than half the price of comparable products. I would highly recommend this belt to beginners and advanced lifters alike. The sizing chart is spot on. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I chose Stoic for my belt purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I chose Stoic for my belt purchase. The only thing that is difficult to deal with is when doing squats. the belt pinches / bends my lower rib. Very uncomfortable. I will keep working on modifying technique while maintaining proper form. low bar is preferred. Stoic the company is great to work with . very nice support people working there.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: This belt rocks
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with the quality of this belt. This is no ordinary belt. The construction is top quality made with great attention to detail. Packaging has a quote from Marcus Aurelius "You have to assemble your life, yourself, action by action. Buy this belt. You will not regret the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product at a very moderate price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product at a very moderate price. You can’t ask for more than that!!! I already have a very good 10 mm 4 inch double prong belt and I was hoping this would be an improvement. If you want a little more support, or you’re tired of tightening 2 prongs, you should get this belt!
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Totally Happy...Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the belt since August 1. Use it for my every-other-day lift sessions. Can't imagine lifting without it again. Seems high quality and well made. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KCee

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy belt. Super nice quality and seems like it will last for ages. The smell will get you at first though, but keep in mind it is real rawhide. Customer service far exceeded expectations. Would 100% recommend ordering from this company
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best belt I've owned for powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best belt I've owned for powerlifting. Very affordable and amazing quality. The thickness and everything about this is as good as it can get
customer_reviews.author: Shayan

customer_reviews.title: GO 1 SIZE BIGGER!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good value. Went by the measuring instructions, got the size recommended, a little small, should have gone up 1 size. I am in the 2nd to last hole with it very tight. I have room to drill an additional hole if necessary but thought I was getting it plenty big enough. Just like in most of the reviews I read, “GO 1 SIZE BIGGER”!!! Great support though, tremendous support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this weight lifting belt from this seller. The first belt that I purchased was very good quality and twice the thickness which made for great lifts. The second belt that I received was only a single piece of leather and very flimsy. I suspect that the seller found that he could increase his revenue by reducing the qualify of the belt. I would not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, made a huge difference over my cheap valeo belt. However, it is really difficult to take the belt off when tightened. May move to latched inzer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best belt I have bought
customer_reviews.text: Best belt I have bought, only one prong,means easy to put on and take off, Im short so I use a smaller belt for deadlifts.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great belt. Great customer support
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and very high quality. From aupport to comfort it is a perfect belt. Totally recommend. Oh and customer service is more than exceptional!!
customer_reviews.author: serhad ketsamanian

customer_reviews.title: Belt is way too stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I put the belt on and it was impossible to take off. I was in the gym for 20 minutes with a friend pulling as hard as we could to get it off me. Only way to get it off was to use a knife to cut it open.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: great belt!! (pinches you a little bit)
customer_reviews.text: love the belt differently helping me lift more. I can get it 5 holes in and that's more than enough for tight and still, have more to go smaller. The only thing is lifting that heavy and tight does hurt my sides a little and my lower abs a little bit because it does pinch you.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Disappointed because it’s too small and they don’t have any medium left So i had to return it! Hopefully I won’t to wait too long!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, tons of support and almost no break in required
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!!!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot get a better product for the price! This was the first time I have bought a weight belt and I have been looking for one for quite a while. I was afraid that I would have to sacrifice quality for price. That is certainly not the case with Evolutionize. It is clear that everything is made very well and I plan on using the belt and wraps for a long time. I look forward to purchasing additional products in the future. Like many have mentioned, you should break it in a little bit before trying it on.
customer_reviews.author: Ang P.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the belt and the timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: In general, I am happy with the belt and the timely delivery. The stitching seems sturdy and the materials are comfortable. However, I was disappointed with the rivets used the hold the buckle in place. As soon as I rolled the belt to put it away, a rivet popped and the others are barely hanging on. Customer service was eager to fix the issue and replace my belt so all in all I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett King

customer_reviews.title: This belt is simply fantastic. Extremely sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This belt is simply fantastic. Extremely sturdy and durable, I am confident this belt will last me a lifetime - and then some more! Great for when your going for those heavy singles or triples. I am a 32 waist and got the belt in large. Fits like a charm on the 3rd hole of the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Tsavo Neal

customer_reviews.title: Budget price, not quality
customer_reviews.text: I honestly have to say that for the price, this is an excellent belt. Very well made and perfect for a first belt, especially if you're on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Big Rigg

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better company
customer_reviews.text: Great product and even better company!!! Sharon helped resolve a sizing issue for us and it was easy! Thank you! Quality belt. Quality buckle!
customer_reviews.author: Terra Good

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: really high quality belt. Definately make with good material and high standards. Felt even halfway broke in when i got it. Im happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best belt for the money hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying my best not to sound like a robot, but I really couldn't be more pleased with the company and the product. The belt is extremely robust and made of very high quality material. Any intermediate lifter looking to buy an entry level belt shouldn't hesitate to buy this belt. The belt is well worth the money, and the company is very well managed and extremely polite! I accidentally ordered a size too small and they didn't hesitate to give me a free exchange!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boat
customer_reviews.text: Are use mine strictly for dead lifting and squatting and works out pretty good
customer_reviews.author: JC Garrido

customer_reviews.title: ... for years if your into powerlifting this is as good or better as higher priced belts its made a ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy or flashy 13mm thick does the job for me it's rugged as hell simple to use and should last for years if your into powerlifting this is as good or better as higher priced belts its made a world of difference FOr my back in deadlifts and squats a 50$ bill gets you what you need to get the job done get one and chase those PR's
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lifting belt but sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: First lifting belt I ever owned or used and for me it works great. Plenty of support and easy enough to latch and unlatch with the single buckle. Extremely well constructed but sizing is tricky. My waist size was in the range of a medium but when received it was too small so sent back for a large it all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Paceline

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive yet quality item
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive lifting belt that provides support to back as well as abdominal wall while performing heavy lifts. I like how it is same width across entire length of the belt. The leather will need breaking in, but I am extremely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Castecka

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Works great for squats and deadlifts, and reminds me to brace.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The belt is very well made and will greatly assist me is reaching my exercise and health goals.eligah holmes.
customer_reviews.author: eligah holmes

customer_reviews.title: The size recommendation was off and the loop of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The size recommendation was off and the loop of the belt is to close to the center so you can’t slide it in because of the stiffness. C’mon guys!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Crifase

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bodybuilding & Weight Lifting Belt
customer_reviews.text: Great supportive belt. Excellent quality, very comfortable, I wish I bought this belt years ago. It doesn’t slide up, it doesn’t pinch, it does exactly what it should do. By far way better than anything else I have used. You’ll be glad you bought this belt-
customer_reviews.author: Danielle suico

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Nice lifting belt! Comfortable to wear and so far seems to be a quality product. I have only used the belt a few times so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McCumber

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As a novice lifter I absolutely love it. Plenty of support for a 275lb x 5 squat and 385lb x 5 deadlift. I will be buying the 12mm belt by next year most likely.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sage

customer_reviews.title: Love this belt, can't believe I waited so long
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Belt for about 2 weeks and I love it. I got an Large, I'm in the middle of the holes with 2 on each side. I've been using a cheap belt for about 3-4 years, definitely can feel the difference and quality. Would definitely buy again, love the single prong. I can see where people might need to break this in but I had no problems using the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher White

customer_reviews.title: even better than the pictures show
customer_reviews.text: This belt is well-crafted, even better than the pictures show. I am more than satisfied with this belt, and in the future will look to this company for gear purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Vasquez Family

product_meta.title: Powerlifting Belt/Weight Lifting Belt - 4 Inches Wide - No Taper for Maximum Support & Protection
feature_bullets: PREFERRED STYLE FOR SERIOUS LIFTERS - 4 inch width all the way around, 10MM thickness (with only 1.2mm of suede) providing you superior support. Non-tapered front dramatically reduces stress on the back from rounding on exercises like the squat and deadlift and over extension on exercises like the overhead press by allowing both the abdominal wall and back to firmly brace. Best used for heavy Powerlifting, Weightlifting, Bodybuilding, Strongman and even heavy cross training workouts.

BUILT TO LAST FOREVER - Belt construction and value, second to none. High-end materials: vegetable tanned, full grain sole leather. Strong nylon stitching. Ultra heavy single prong buckle with seamless roller. The end result is a belt that lasts and remains supportive for years to come.

A DIFFERENCE YOU CAN SEE - We’ve eliminated the inner suede and left the edges of this high end belt raw and un-dyed because it’s expensive leather needs no cover up. You can visibly see every belt is properly tanned and has absolutely no “wet blue” tone to hide.

FOCUSED ON THE DETAILS - Our belt also uses only a single suede exterior, versus both inside & out. This increases support, longevity (and price) by eliminating nearly 2MM of suede wrap and instead using thicker core leathers; the material that aids in support.
5 STAR EXPERIENCE GUARANTEE - We're confident you'll absolutely love our powerlifting belt - or any of our other products! If somehow you aren't 100% satisfied, just contact us!
